tool_description: Metadata on publicly available information on various pageant contests.

api_list.name: Single Country
api_list.description: Get all details of a country by its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the country.

api_list.name: Search Country
api_list.description: Search for a country if they had an active pageant contest.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The name of the country to search for.

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: Get a list of all countries involved in a pageant contest.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for pageant contests by keyword.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The keyword to search for pageant contests.

api_list.name: Single contest
api_list.description: Get details of a single pageant contest by its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the pageant contest.

api_list.name: All pageant contests
api_list.description: Get a list of all pageant contests.
